item.title: RRB NTPC UG Answer Key 2025 News Live Updates: What's next after provisional key is released, check steps to download
item.description: RRB NTPC UG Answer Key 2025 News Live Updates: The RRBs will release the NTPC UG answer key 2025 on official website of regional RRBs. Follow the blog for latest updates on NTPC provisional answer key.

item.title: West Bengal teacher recruitment test for classes 11-12 draws 2.29 lakh aspirants
item.description: The School Level Selection Test (SLST), being held after nine years, was conducted across 478 centres, all located in educational institutions.

item.title: CAT 2025 registration deadline extended, apply by September 20 at iimcat.ac.in, link here
item.description: CAT 2025 registration deadline has been extended till September 20 at iimcat.ac.in. Candidates can apply via the direct link given below.

item.title: UTET Admit Card 2025 released at ukutet.com, direct link to download here
item.description: UTET Admit Card 2025 has been released at ukutet.com. Candidates can download their hall tickets through the direct link given below.

item.title: UGC NET 2025: NTA releases certificates at ugcnet.nta.ac.in, direct link here
item.description: UGC NET 2025: NTA has released the certificates at ugcnet.nta.ac.in. Candidates can download via the direct link given below.
